attributes.action: Make it illegal to remove, destroy or deface the Union Jack or UK national flags
attributes.additional_details: These flags represent our shared history, culture and identity. They are important symbols of unity and pride. Damaging them can currently be treated as criminal damage, but a dedicated law would give them the respect and protection they deserve.
attributes.background: Make it a specific offence to remove, burn, destroy or deface the Union Jack or the national flags of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/719227
